to.shell_command: export PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin; yabai -m window --focus west || yabai -m display --focus west
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin; yabai -m window --focus east || yabai -m display --focus east

rules.description: Change Caps Lock to Control when used as modifier, Escape when used alone, only for inbuilt
Change right option to f19, only inbuilt
Equals and delete together to forward delete
Right Command to Hyper (Command + Shift + Option + Control), left arrow when tapped, fjell / keycult zero
Right Command to Hyper (Command + Shift + Option + Control), not fjell or keycult zero
Unmap wifi sysdiagnose (Command + Shift + Option + Control + w)
Unmap sysdiagnose (Command + Shift + Option + Control + period)
Right Option to Command + Option + Control, down arrow when tapped, fjell / keycult zero
Right Option to Command + Option + Control, not fjell / keycult zero
Right Shift to up arrow when tapped, shift when held, fjell or keycult zero
Right control to right arrow when tapped, control when held, fjell or keycult zero
Change Left Control to Escape when used alone, or Left Control when held down, hiro / keycult zero / keyc / paragon / fjell / maja / q1 / alt drop
Control p/n to up/down in Obsidian
Control p/n to up/down in Slack
